problem_names:
lemma weakCongruenceE:
  fixes P  :: "ccs"
  and   Q  :: "ccs"

  assumes "P \<cong> Q"

  shows "P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q"
  and   "Q \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> P"

lemma weakCongruenceI:
  fixes P :: "ccs"
  and   Q :: "ccs"

  assumes "P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q"
  and     "Q \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> P"

  shows "P \<cong> Q"

lemma weakCongISym[consumes 1, case_names cSym cSim]:
  fixes P :: ccs
  and   Q :: ccs

  assumes "Prop P Q"
  and     "\<And>P Q. Prop P Q \<Longrightarrow> Prop Q P"
  and     "\<And>P Q. Prop P Q \<Longrightarrow> (F P) \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> (F Q)"

  shows "F P \<cong> F Q"

lemma weakCongISym2[consumes 1, case_names cSim]:
  fixes P :: ccs
  and   Q :: ccs

  assumes "P \<cong> Q"
  and     "\<And>P Q. P \<cong> Q \<Longrightarrow> (F P) \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> (F Q)"

  shows "F P \<cong> F Q"

lemma reflexive: 
  fixes P :: ccs

  shows "P \<cong> P"

lemma symmetric: 
  fixes P :: ccs
  and   Q :: ccs

  assumes "P \<cong> Q"

  shows "Q \<cong> P"

lemma transitive: 
  fixes P :: ccs
  and   Q :: ccs
  and   R :: ccs

  assumes "P \<cong> Q"
  and     "Q \<cong> R"

  shows "P \<cong> R"

lemma bisimWeakCongruence:
  fixes P :: ccs
  and   Q :: ccs
  
  assumes "P \<sim> Q"

  shows "P \<cong> Q"

lemma structCongWeakCongruence:
  fixes P :: ccs
  and   Q :: ccs

  assumes "P \<equiv>\<^sub>s Q"

  shows "P \<cong> Q"

lemma weakCongruenceWeakBisimulation:
  fixes P :: ccs
  and   Q :: ccs
  
  assumes "P \<cong> Q"

  shows "P \<approx> Q"
translations:
lemma weakCongruenceE:
  fixes P  :: "ccs"
  and   Q  :: "ccs"

  assumes "P \<cong> Q"

  shows "P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q"
  and   "Q \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> P"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q &&& Q \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> P

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<cong> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q &&& Q \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> P

lemma weakCongruenceI:
  fixes P :: "ccs"
  and   Q :: "ccs"

  assumes "P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q"
  and     "Q \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> P"

  shows "P \<cong> Q"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q
  Q \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> P

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<cong> Q

lemma weakCongISym[consumes 1, case_names cSym cSim]:
  fixes P :: ccs
  and   Q :: ccs

  assumes "Prop P Q"
  and     "\<And>P Q. Prop P Q \<Longrightarrow> Prop Q P"
  and     "\<And>P Q. Prop P Q \<Longrightarrow> (F P) \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> (F Q)"

  shows "F P \<cong> F Q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F P \<cong> F Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  Prop P Q
  Prop ?P ?Q \<Longrightarrow> Prop ?Q ?P
  Prop ?P ?Q \<Longrightarrow> F ?P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> F ?Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F P \<cong> F Q

lemma weakCongISym2[consumes 1, case_names cSim]:
  fixes P :: ccs
  and   Q :: ccs

  assumes "P \<cong> Q"
  and     "\<And>P Q. P \<cong> Q \<Longrightarrow> (F P) \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> (F Q)"

  shows "F P \<cong> F Q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F P \<cong> F Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<cong> Q
  ?P \<cong> ?Q \<Longrightarrow> F ?P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> F ?Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F P \<cong> F Q

lemma reflexive: 
  fixes P :: ccs

  shows "P \<cong> P"

lemma symmetric: 
  fixes P :: ccs
  and   Q :: ccs

  assumes "P \<cong> Q"

  shows "Q \<cong> P"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<cong> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Q \<cong> P

lemma transitive: 
  fixes P :: ccs
  and   Q :: ccs
  and   R :: ccs

  assumes "P \<cong> Q"
  and     "Q \<cong> R"

  shows "P \<cong> R"
let ?Prop = "\<lambda>P R. \<exists>Q. P \<cong> Q \<and> Q \<cong> R"

proof (chain)
picking this:
  P \<cong> Q
  Q \<cong> R

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<cong> Q
  Q \<cong> R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>Q. P \<cong> Q \<and> Q \<cong> R

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>Q. P \<cong> Q \<and> Q \<cong> R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<cong> R

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<exists>Q. P \<cong> Q \<and> Q \<cong> R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<cong> R

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       \<exists>Qa. P \<cong> Qa \<and> Qa \<cong> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>Qa. Q \<cong> Qa \<and> Qa \<cong> P
 2. \<And>P Q.
       \<exists>Qa. P \<cong> Qa \<and> Qa \<cong> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>Q. P \<cong> Q \<and> Q \<cong> R

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       \<exists>Qa. P \<cong> Qa \<and> Qa \<cong> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>Qa. Q \<cong> Qa \<and> Qa \<cong> P
 2. \<And>P Q.
       \<exists>Qa. P \<cong> Qa \<and> Qa \<cong> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<exists>Q. P \<cong> Q \<and> Q \<cong> R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>Q. R \<cong> Q \<and> Q \<cong> P

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>Q. R \<cong> Q \<and> Q \<cong> P

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       \<exists>Qa. P \<cong> Qa \<and> Qa \<cong> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       \<exists>Qa. P \<cong> Qa \<and> Qa \<cong> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>Q. P \<cong> Q \<and> Q \<cong> R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       \<exists>Qa. P \<cong> Qa \<and> Qa \<cong> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<exists>Q. P \<cong> Q \<and> Q \<cong> R
obtain Q where "P \<cong> Q" and "Q \<cong> R"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<exists>Q. P \<cong> Q \<and> Q \<cong> R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>Q.
        \<lbrakk>P \<cong> Q; Q \<cong> R\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (state)
this:
  P \<cong> Q
  Q \<cong> R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       \<exists>Qa. P \<cong> Qa \<and> Qa \<cong> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<cong> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q

proof (state)
this:
  P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       \<exists>Qa. P \<cong> Qa \<and> Qa \<cong> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q

proof (state)
this:
  P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       \<exists>Qa. P \<cong> Qa \<and> Qa \<cong> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  Q \<cong> R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Q \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> R

proof (state)
this:
  Q \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       \<exists>Qa. P \<cong> Qa \<and> Qa \<cong> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q

proof (state)
this:
  Q \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       \<exists>Qa. P \<cong> Qa \<and> Qa \<cong> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>?P \<approx> ?Q; ?Q \<approx> ?R\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?P \<approx> ?R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. weakBisimulation O weakBisimulation \<subseteq> weakBisimulation

proof (state)
this:
  weakBisimulation O weakBisimulation \<subseteq> weakBisimulation

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       \<exists>Qa. P \<cong> Qa \<and> Qa \<cong> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q

proof (chain)
picking this:
  P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q
  Q \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> R
  weakBisimulation O weakBisimulation \<subseteq> weakBisimulation

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q
  Q \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> R
  weakBisimulation O weakBisimulation \<subseteq> weakBisimulation

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> R

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q
  Q \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> R
  weakBisimulation O weakBisimulation \<subseteq> weakBisimulation
  ?P \<approx> ?Q \<Longrightarrow>
  ?P \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<weakBisimulation> ?Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> R

proof (state)
this:
  P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> R

No subgoals!

proof (state)
this:
  P \<cong> R

lemma bisimWeakCongruence:
  fixes P :: ccs
  and   Q :: ccs
  
  assumes "P \<sim> Q"

  shows "P \<cong> Q"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<sim> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<cong> Q

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>P Q. P \<sim> Q \<Longrightarrow> Q \<sim> P
 2. \<And>P Q. P \<sim> Q \<Longrightarrow> P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q

proof (state)
this:
  P \<sim> Q

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>P Q. P \<sim> Q \<Longrightarrow> Q \<sim> P
 2. \<And>P Q. P \<sim> Q \<Longrightarrow> P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q

using this:

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Q \<sim> P

proof (state)
this:
  Q \<sim> P

goal (1 subgoal):

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q. P \<sim> Q \<Longrightarrow> P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q

proof (state)
this:
  P \<sim> Q

 1. \<And>P Q. P \<sim> Q \<Longrightarrow> P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q

proof (prove)
using this:

goal (1 subgoal):

proof (state)
this:

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q. P \<sim> Q \<Longrightarrow> P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<leadsto>[bisim] Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<leadsto>[weakBisimulation] Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<leadsto>[bisim] Q
  ?P \<sim> ?Q \<Longrightarrow> ?P \<approx> ?Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<leadsto>[weakBisimulation] Q

proof (state)
this:
  P \<leadsto>[weakBisimulation] Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q. P \<sim> Q \<Longrightarrow> P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<leadsto>[weakBisimulation] Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q

this:
  P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q

lemma weakCongruenceWeakBisimulation:
  fixes P :: ccs
  and   Q :: ccs
  
  assumes "P \<cong> Q"

  shows "P \<approx> Q"
let ?X = "{(P, Q) | P Q. P \<cong> Q}"

proof (state)
this:
  (P, Q) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<cong> Q}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<approx> Q

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>R S.
       (R, S) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<cong> Q} \<Longrightarrow>
       R \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<({(P, Q) |P Q. P \<cong> Q} \<union>
                             weakBisimulation)> S
 2. \<And>R S.
       (R, S) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<cong> Q} \<Longrightarrow>
       (S, R) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<cong> Q}

proof (state)
this:
  (P, Q) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<cong> Q}

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>R S.
       (R, S) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<cong> Q} \<Longrightarrow>
       R \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<({(P, Q) |P Q. P \<cong> Q} \<union>
                             weakBisimulation)> S
 2. \<And>R S.
       (R, S) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<cong> Q} \<Longrightarrow>
       (S, R) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<cong> Q}

proof (state)
this:
  P \<cong> Q

 1. \<And>R S.

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<cong> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q

proof (state)
this:
  P \<leadsto><weakBisimulation> Q

goal (2 subgoals):

using this:
